links.title: Remove (Pattern Day Trader) Regulations | We the People: Your Voice in Our Government
links.description: PDT (pattern day trading) regulations and rules for stock traders are discriminatory towards people without large amounts of cash on hand. The rule states you must have a minimum of $25,000 in your brokerage account in order to be a PDT which allows unlimited day trades with 4X margin.

links.title: RBC Bullish On Spotify (NYSE:SPOT) Ahead Of IPO, Sets $220 Price Target
links.description: Wall Street isn't waiting for Spotify Technology (NYSE: SPOT)'s planned April 3 IPO to weigh in on the stock. RBC Capital Markets analyst Mark Mahaney has initiated coverage of Spotify with an Outperform rating and $220 price target. Spotify stock has roughly 70-percent upside from its recent $127.50 private transaction price, Mahaney said in a Thursday note.

messages.body: $AAPL Apple is finally getting ready to launch its own original programming studio, but it's not necessarily a wi… https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-is-apple-inc-aapl-too-late-to-the-streaming-video/

links.title: Is Apple Inc. (AAPL) Too Late To The Streaming Video Party?
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is the biggest company on earth, and its continued growth depends largely on its services division. That unit includes products like iCloud, Apple Music, the App Store, and more. Soon, it'll also include a rapidly growing library of streaming TV content, produced from its brand new 128,000-square-foot headquarters near Hollywood for its entertainment division.
